data.enText: to get involved in and try to influence a situation that does not concern you, in a way that annoys other people
I wish my mother would stop interfering and let me make my own decisions.
data.chText: 我希望我母亲不再干预，让我自己拿主意。

data.enText: The police are very unwilling to interfere in family problems.
data.chText: 警方很不情愿插手家庭问题。

data.enText: to illegally try to influence sb who is going to give evidence in court, for example by threatening them or offering them money
data.chText: 干扰证人（企图威胁或贿赂等）

data.enText: to touch a child in a sexual way
to prevent sth from succeeding or from being done or happening as planned
She never allows her personal feelings to interfere with her work.
data.chText: 她从不让她的个人感情妨碍工作。

data.enText: to touch, use or change sth, especially a piece of equipment, so that it is damaged or no longer works correctly
I'd get fired if he found out I'd been interfering with his records.
data.chText: 要是他发现我把他的唱片捣鼓坏了，我就得被解雇了。

simple_means.memory_skill: inter- 在…之间,相互 + fere 带来,拿来

data.enText: to illegally try to influence sb who is going to give evidence in court, for example by threatening them or offering them money
data.chText: 干扰证人（企图威胁或贿赂等）

data.enText: to touch a child in a sexual way
to prevent sth from succeeding or from being done or happening as planned
She never allows her personal feelings to interfere with her work.
data.chText: 她从不让她的个人感情妨碍工作。

data.enText: to touch, use or change sth, especially a piece of equipment, so that it is damaged or no longer works correctly
I'd get fired if he found out I'd been interfering with his records.
data.chText: 要是他发现我把他的唱片捣鼓坏了，我就得被解雇了。

tr: come between so as to be hindrance or obstacle
example: Your talking interferes with my work!

tr: get involved, so as to alter or hinder an action, or through force or threat of force
example: Why did the U.S. not intervene earlier in WW II?

example.ex: I wish everyone would stop interfering and just leave me alone...
example.tran: 我希望大家都别再来干涉我,让我一个人静一静。

example.ex: The UN cannot interfere in the internal affairs of any country.
example.tran: 联合国不能干涉任何国家的内政。

value.def: If you say that someone interferes in a situation, you mean they get involved in it although it does not concern them and their involvement is not wanted.

example.ex: Drug problems frequently interfered with his work...
example.tran: 吸毒问题频频干扰他的工作。

example.ex: Alexander wasn't going to let a lack of space interfere with his plans...
example.tran: 亚历山大不会让空间不够的问题妨碍他的计划。

example.ex: Smoking and drinking interfere with your body's ability to process oxygen.
example.tran: 抽烟与酗酒有碍身体处理氧气的能力。

value.def: Something that interferes with a situation, activity, or process has a damaging effect on it.

partsOfSpeech.dec: inter- 在…之间,相互 + est 存在
inter- 在…之间,相互 + nation n.民族 + -al ...的
inter- 在…之间,相互 + view n.视力
inter- 在…之间,相互 + rupt 打破,破裂
inter- 在…之间,相互 + val 墙
inter- 在…之间,相互 + action n.行动
inter- 在…之间,相互 + -ior 较...的
inter- 在…之间,相互 + medi 中间 + -ate 具有...的
inter- 在…之间,相互 + pret 价值
inter- 在…之间,相互 + act 行动,做
inter- 在…之间,相互 + ven 来 + -e

partsOfSpeech.d: (人机)界面(尤指屏幕布局和菜单)
partsOfSpeech.dec: inter- 在…之间,相互 + face n.脸
